lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: we are a co-operative and this is how we show we care.
lender.occupational_info: ACYL is a non-profit organization focusing on co-operative educationand empowerment for youth across Atlantic Canada. As a co-operative organization it is with great humility that we do whatever we can to assist people who need it the most. Co-op principle # 7

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupational_info: I work with children in a low-income neighborhood on the southwest side of Charlotte. I raise money for the programs, recruit volunteers for tutoring and mentoring, and work with our church partners to communicate needs.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I no longer loan via kiva because I am appalled at Kiva's stance with regard to cruelty against animals. I do not wish to support cockfighting, however indirectly, and Kiva's refusal to block cockfighting loans (despite repeatedly being made aware of the concerns of many Kivans) is a great disappointment to me. Maybe cockfighting is part of the "tradition" in other countries but so is female genital mutilation. Should we support this, too? Not everything that's done in other cultures is "something of value".

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: all people across the globe deserve to live their lives with dignity and have the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Director of Global Education Programs (for high school students) that promote international understanding and the development of awareness of global food security issues.

lender.name: Jackie and Gary
lender.loan_because: of my experience as an entreprenauer in the US. It is not easy but possible when another believes in you and your goals.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: nodepo
lender.loan_because: It's the no deposit casinos feeling! Come feel!
lender.occupational_info: gambling, no deposit casinos, free casino

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday is a brand-new shiny adventure!

lender.name: Rockbondens Bank

lender.occupational_info: We are two families that decided to get together and start a "bank".

lender.name: bunnychiu
lender.loan_because: when i can empower someone, I feel empowered

lender.name: Shilo
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to support themselves and sometimes you just need a little help to get started or to rebuild. I've turned to family and friends when I've needed support and I want to help others have the same opportunity.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is required. I want to live a life based upon service. :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. In my classroom, I teach small children basic skills. Outside of my classroom, I teach older children and adults how to manage their money wisely. :D

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at success!
lender.occupational_info: I make websites

lender.name: Lianne
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way help someone to get a better life!

lender.name: Evie & Santi
lender.loan_because: We give because of Jesus' heart for the poor and the forgotten, and believe He blessed us with resources so we could be a blessing to others. We believe that by empowering people to help themselves is really loving because it gives them dignity. And as we journey together in the process, it builds community and is so much more powerful than simply charitable giving.

lender.name: afm
lender.loan_because: I planned to make a website, which will provide lots of ways to make money from online. In this way many many people can work here from there home and earn money. When they start working and get paid then those people don't need to take a loan anymore.
lender.occupational_info: It's a online work. People who will work in my site don't need advanced knowledge. They just have post some topics in the specific forum. And refer his/her friends to work with. One can earn $1000-1500 easily. If he/she have more referrals in down line they can earn 2/3times more.

lender.loan_because: ...credit is not a four-letter word.

lender.name: mohammed
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of something bigger than myself

lender.name: Majelle
lender.loan_because: we all need a help now and then. I'm passing it on, paying it forward.

lender.name: jakobien
lender.loan_because: The world is good place for some and a plain survival test for others. For a great deal it is defined by where you've been born and grown up, geographically and socially. I see micro credit as a way to start resolving the divide between rich and poor.
lender.occupational_info: I help making concepts and ideas into websites with a small team of Argentinian and Dutch co-workers.

lender.loan_because: I can,even if it's just a little...

lender.occupational_info:
These days, it seems I only work to support my internet habit!
Places you can find me if I'm not on Kiva or KF:
www.ikat.org : Greg Mortenson's Central Asia Institute, a non-profit organization that supports education, especially for girls, in remote regions of Pakistan and Afghanistan.
www.flickr.com/photos/tom-poes : This couple living in the Netherlands raises Ragdoll cats and are wonderfully prolific Flickr posters...please enjoy their beautiful kittens and cats!

lender.occupational_info: Technical customer service in the integrated circuit industry. I write software and design hardware.

lender.name: Corn√©
lender.loan_because: We (my wife, 2-year old daughter and I) are in a very privileged position. We have a home, food and all the small luxuries that one can need. We are not rich (in terms of money), but we do not have to struggle to get food on the table, dress ourselves and all the other small things that one tends to take as granted. When I browsed the KIVA webpage I realised that a small amount (in our eyes) will make a big difference in someone else's. It is a privilege to be part of this organisation and assist where we can!

lender.loan_because: I beleive that our lives have a ripple effect on the world. One must help and take care of oneself with the majority of your energy. Then you help your Family. Then your friends. Community, Region, Nation and World. I am particular about how I can ethically make money. HOw I can help heal and protect my family. How I make my friends self sufficient and aware. I walk with concern about my interactions with our society and environment. I create a sustainable economy through being discerning over what I purchase with my money. I loan to those who wish to create a better world. Money is only lost when it is held.

lender.name: Trails End Memorial
lender.loan_because: We have withdrawn our funds from Kiva ... and are making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over 3 years Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore we have withdrawen our funds and are supporting other more humane organizations.

Jennifer has shown me a terrific way to contribute in my own small way. Thank you Jennifer and Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a terrific company based in Fort Meyers, Florida. Their name is J. Lodge. I audit customer service calls. J.
